variables.desc: The Mega-CD, known as the Sega CD in North America, is a CD-ROM peripheral for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis video game console. It was designed to enhance the capabilities of the Mega Drive by adding CD-ROM support, improved graphics, and enhanced sound capabilities.

The Sega CD is a CD-ROM peripheral for the Sega Genesis video game console. It was designed to enhance the capabilities of the Genesis by adding CD-ROM support, improved graphics, and enhanced sound capabilities.
